Articles.Content:
My  old computer’s HDD just failed, and I’d really like to be able to play KSP 2 when it comes out on whatever machine I get.

Would anybody care to speculate (or if you are more informed than I, share the actual current best guess) about what the Windows systems requirements are likely to be for the game?

Windows 10 minimum.

Win 7 is no longer supported, and Microsoft would rather forget Win 8 and 8.1, and the early builds of Win 10 are no longer supported either.. Best guess, I'd say I'm pretty on the money rather than a guess.

As far as the rest of the specs.. plenty of threads talking about hardware specs, a search will find them.

Edited March 1, 2020 by Radar

The higher clockrate of the CPU, the better it will perform. All else is speculation, I have a 1080ti and am fairly certain I will not be upgrading... I'm guessing 16 gigs of RAM would be good, 32 if you want to keep 100 tabs open in the background at the same time
